message: This offer accounts for the decreasing value of the money.  It gives us both a better deal than waiting.
A bit more for me to account for the higher inflation on my side
Alice, we need to find a compromise soon. This offer is fair considering the inflation is affecting your share more quickly.
I'm taking a bit more due to the increasing inflation difference
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  My offer is more than generous considering the inflation is eating away at your share far quicker than mine.  Agree now, or this will end badly for both of us.
Inflation gap is increasing, I need more to compensate
Alice, this is my final offer. A 50/50 split is the ONLY fair option at this point.  Accept this, or we both lose EVERYTHING.
Last chance, I need a bigger share due to the huge inflation difference
Alice, this is it. You're being completely unreasonable about the inflation.  Take this offer, or get ready to walk away with NOTHING. This is your LAST chance.
